name: Colombian Coffee
description: Rich and bold with a perfect balance of acidity and sweetness, ideal for a morning boost.
tastingNotes: Bright acidity with fruity undertones and a smooth finish.

name: Ethiopian Coffee
description: Fruity and aromatic, with floral notes and a bright, crisp finish. A favorite for coffee enthusiasts.
tastingNotes: Floral aroma with hints of berry and citrus, and a clean aftertaste.

name: Brazilian Coffee
description: Smooth and nutty, with chocolatey undertones and a rich body. Perfect for a comforting cup.
tastingNotes: Rich chocolate notes with a smooth nutty finish, ideal for those who love a full-bodied cup.
